vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 28771, previously approved on September 12, 2012, which licensed a portion of an alley, located near the intersection of Tenth Street and Madison Avenue to Homeward Bound Inc. and assigned to UG Melba, LLC to: (1) add a new paragraph for obligation of required conditions as a new Section 7 and renumbering; (2) substitute a new Exhibit A; and (3) add a new Exhibit C,  for the use of approximately 200 square feet of land to maintain and utilize a pedestrian skybridge over and above a portion of alley near its intersection with Tenth Street - Revenue: General Fund $2,428.00 annually, plus the $20.00 ordinance publication fee
